(A) Experiments on DSK and CCS


1.Solutions of difference equations


2.Impulse Response


3.Linear Convolution.


4.Circular Convolution


5.Study of procedure to work in real- time.


6.Fast Fourier Transform Algorithms: (DIT, DIF)


7.Design of FIR (LP/HP) using windows,(a) Rectangular , (b)Triangular ,(c)Hamming window


8.Design of IIR (HP/LP) filters.


(B) Experiments on signal processing.


1.DFT and FFT algorithm


2.Linear Convolutions


3.Circular Convolutions


4.FIR filter design using different data windows


5.IIR filter design: Butter worth, chebysheve type 1 and 2 and Bilinear transformation Methods.


6.Interpolation and Decimation.


Note:


1.Minimum of 5 from Part A and 5 from Part B is mandatory.


2.For section ‘B’, MATLAB with different toolboxes like Signal Processing, Signal Processing block set, and SIMULINK/ MATHEMATICA/ any popular software can be used.
